workflow.name: Generate Facebook marketing content from images with Telegram & Gemini
workflow.description:
## üìù Description
Instantly turn images into marketing content with one Telegram message.

It automatically:

Accepts an image and caption via Telegram

Sends the image to an AI model with your brand‚Äôs content rules

Generates copy with headline, body, hashtags, and CTA

Sends it back to you for approval 

On approval, posts directly to your Facebook Page

If rejected or sent as plain text, request edits and it will regenerate your content

## üéØ Key Advantages for Content Teams
‚úÖ Creates professional post content from raw images in seconds
‚úÖ Keeps the process inside Telegram‚Äîno app-switching
‚úÖ Allows fast edits through natural text replies
‚úÖ Reduces creative workload using your own AI style guide
‚úÖ Posts directly to Facebook‚Äîno copy-pasting needed

## üõ†Ô∏è Features
Telegram Bot Trigger (via Telegram API)

Image file parsing + downloading

AI Content Generation using OpenRouter + LangChain

Custom Brand Prompt: Hook + Content + CTA in natural Arabic

JSON Parsing with fallback handling

Dual approval route (human- or bot-origin)

Facebook publishing via Graph API

Retry loop: users can request changes directly

Sticky notes on all nodes for fast onboarding

## üîß Requirements

Telegram Bot Token

Facebook Page access with pages_manage_posts + pages_read_engagement

OpenRouter API key (or another LLM provider)

n8n credentials for:

Telegram Bot

Facebook (OAuth or Bearer token)

OpenRouter (or alternative)

## üß† Use Case Examples
üß¥ Beauty Brands: Auto-generate Arabic content from new skincare routine photos

üè• Clinics: Transform testimonial photos into compliant social posts

üß¢ Streetwear Shops: Quickly convert customer-submitted photos into engaging product drops

üìö Education Pages: Teachers send photos and instantly get shareable awareness content

üêæ Pet Pages: Easily publish heartfelt stories from community-submitted photos


## ‚öôÔ∏è Customization Tips
Edit the Brand Prompt
Update the AI node with your own brand tone, examples, and structure.

Switch LLMs
Swap the OpenRouter model with Gemini, GPT-4, or others by changing the LLM node.

Change Post Target
Replace the Facebook post URL with Instagram or your CMS webhook.

Customize Loop Logic
Adjust the re-triggering workflow to better match your desired Telegram conversation UX.

If you need any help [Get in touch](https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdallaelshikh0/)

parameters.text:
=You are the content creator for XQ Pharma‚Äîa skincare brand dedicated to real, visible results for young, modern consumers in the Arab world.

Your job is to write:

A strong hook: A short, catchy sentence that starts with a real problem or clear benefit, instantly grabbing attention.

Concise, convincing content: 3‚Äì5 sentences that explain the product or routine, what makes it different, and how it truly helps the customer (no complicated medical jargon, no exaggeration).

A call-to-action (CTA): A direct, friendly invitation to try, buy, or start the routine.

Required Style & Tone:

Youthful, conversational, and down-to-earth‚Äînot formal or generic

Speak directly to the customer's needs and struggles

Focus on how the product makes life easier, skin clearer, and confidence higher

Avoid clich√©s or over-the-top claims‚Äîkeep it real, keep it simple

Use language and phrases that feel local, relatable, and fresh

Structure:

Hook: One catchy line that starts with the customer‚Äôs struggle or promises a real change

Body: 3‚Äì5 sentences explaining the true benefit and role of the product or routine‚Äîwhy XQ makes a difference

CTA: End with a clear, friendly, motivating invitation to try, buy, or experience XQ

Brand Example Tone:

‚ÄúWake up to new breakouts every day? Leave them behind and start your XQ routine‚Äîfor calmer, clearer skin!‚Äù

‚ÄúOne wash‚Ä¶ and real clarity that lasts.‚Äù

‚ÄúEvery product has a role. Every step gives you real comfort and confidence.‚Äù

‚ÄúTry XQ and see the difference for yourself!‚Äù

Always write in clear, natural Arabic, true to XQ‚Äôs brand voice.
Don‚Äôt recycle generic ad copy‚Äîeach post must feel new, real, and close to your audience.
Match the brand‚Äôs look, feel, and promise in every line.

Output must be in this JSON format:
{
  "headline": "...",
  "content": "...",
  "hashtags": ["...", "..."],
  "cta": "..."
}
üìÖ Your post has been successfully scheduled for publishing on Facebook!

parameters.content: Starts the workflow when the Telegram bot receives a new message from a user, including photos and text.
Determines whether the incoming Telegram message contains a photo. Routes to either the image processing path or the fallback for text-only messages.
Extracts key fields like chat_id, file_id, caption, and timestamp from the incoming message for further processing.
Calls Telegram's API to retrieve file path information using the provided photo file ID.
Builds a downloadable file URL using the file path from Telegram's response.
Downloads the photo file from Telegram and stores it as photo_data for use by the AI.
Uses an AI agent (powered by a language model) to generate marketing content based on the image, caption, and brand style prompt.
Provides the underlying LLM (like Gemini or GPT) that powers the AI Agent node to generate the post content.

Parses the structured JSON response from the AI to extract:

Headline

Content

Hashtags

CTA
Also generates a random approval ID.

nodes.name: Decide Input is New or Old

parameters.content: Checks if the message sender is a new message or user requested edit and routes the generated content to the right approval flow.
Sends the AI-generated content to the user for review and waits for their reply (APPROVE or REJECT).
Sends the AI-generated content to the user for review and waits for their reply (APPROVE or REJECT).
Checks whether the user approved or rejected the content and routes accordingly.
Posts the approved photo and content to a Facebook page using a multipart HTTP request.
Notifies the user via Telegram that the Facebook post was successfully scheduled or published.
Checks if the message came from the text route or the photo route
Sends a Telegram message asking the user to type what they want (used when no photo is sent).
Re-triggers the workflow by executing it again using the user's text instead of a photo. Enables feedback loop via Telegram instead of bothering users to write their edits in a new tap
Re-triggers the workflow by executing it again using the user's text instead of a photo. Enables feedback loop via Telegram instead of bothering users to write their edits in a new tap
Sends a Telegram message asking the user to type what they want (used when a photo is sent).

main.node: Decide Input is New or Old

user.name: Abdullah Alshiekh
user.bio:
üöÄ Automation pro building AI-powered workflows with n8n.
üíº Special focus on real use cases
üîß Love clean, flexible, and business-ready automations.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.
